decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the wall hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing wall.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (308_01, 02, Block Plan, Site Plan, Location Plan received 12/10/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The metal railing sections of the front boundary treatment shall remain predominantly open in appearance and shall not be replaced by a solid panel or have such a panel affixed behind or in front of them
description: Raise height of boundary wall and entrance gate
